more_information.content:
Search for homes in Scotland on the [Scottish Assessors](http://www.saa.gov.uk) website.

*[VOA]: Valuation Office Agency

introductory_paragraph.content: Find out the Council Tax band for a home in England or Wales by looking up its postcode.

title: Check your Council Tax band
description: Find out the Council Tax band for a property in England, Scotland or Wales by looking up the property's postcode online
